name: Find local leads on Instagram and send them to Google Sheets
description:
Extract contact details and content of local creators and local businesses that are active on Instagram. 

Contact details include: emails, website, phone numbers, address, other social media platforms besides Instagram.

Content includes: bio, number of followers, number of comments, verified status, business type, latest posts, etc. 

Your input must be: location, type of business, language. For example, fitness in Prague, Czech. 
The scraper app will find all gyms in Prague that show up for a local search and have an active Instagram presence.
